## TargetLanguage type

Represents a target language on a translation management system.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type TargetLanguage = {
    Id?: string;
    AvailableWorkflows?: Array<TmsWorkflow>;
    FriendlyName?: string;
    IsReadOnly?: boolean;
    SelectedWorkflow?: TmsWorkflow;
    SelectedWorkflowId?: string;
    TargetPublications?: Array<TargetPublication>;
};
```

**References:** [TmsWorkflow](./open-api-client.tmsworkflow.md)<!-- -->, [TargetPublication](./open-api-client.targetpublication.md)
